plot: "Lily" (Leila Hatami) is a movie star whose husband had died recently. She thinks he's still alive and feels him everywhere. Suddenly, she is on the set of her new movie and starts laughing...
title: Pele akher
plot_es: "Lily" (Leila Hatami) is a movie star whose husband had died recently. She thinks he's still alive and feels him everywhere. Suddenly, she is on the set of her new movie and starts laughing...
